pageProps.content:
At Africa Unwind, we custom-design luxury holidays to Africa – so each itinerary is tailored to perfection to suit each client’s individual needs.

However, we thought we’ll share some of our favourite trips with you so that you can get a better idea of what a bespoke Africa Unwind vacation looks like.

Our trips are categorized as follow: Charming, Stylish & Exclusive.

Our Charming Trips offer superb value for money - without compromising on the experience, while our Stylish Trips are ideal for the luxury traveller who prefer stylish interiors & fantastic experiences. The Crème de la Crème at Africa Unwind is our Exclusive Trips that are best suited for the discerning traveller who requires high-end lodges, exclusivity & world-class service.

Before we can create a suggested itinerary for you, we’ll need an estimate budget - the starting place from which we plan all vacations.

Please journey with us as we share some of our favourite trips below. What are you waiting for?

RATE

USD $ 3,000 – USD $ 6,000 per person

subfolders.title: Beloved Africa
subfolders.description: Experience Table Mountain & Cape Town’s Waterfront • Tick off the Big 5 on a Kruger Safari • See Victoria Falls – one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World • Sleep in a treehouse on safari • Get up, close & personal with Africa’s big cats

subfolders.title: South Africa - Center Stage
subfolders.description: Explore South Africa’s top tourist destinations • See the iconic Table Mountain • Taste delicious cuisine & wine • Experience the best land-based whale-watching in the world • Encounter the famous Big 5 on safari

subfolders.title: Beautiful Botswana
subfolders.description: Enjoy the best wildlife viewing in Africa • See the Okavango Delta from a bird’s eye view (small plane or helicopter) • Experience exciting and & water-based safari activities • Stay at intimate camps in remote settings • Savour spectacular views from the viewing decks • Go on thrilling game drives, guided walks, boating & mokoro safaris

subfolders.title: Namibia's Best Road Trip
subfolders.description: Explore Namibia at your own pace (self-drive) • Capture the perfect photograph • Take a scenic hot air balloon safari over Sossusvlei’s red sand dunes • Search for Namibia’s iconic desert-adapted elephants • Enjoy magnificent stargazing in remote settings • Experience phenomenal Big 5 wildlife viewing

subfolders.title: Zambia Adventures
subfolders.description: Witness the majestic Victoria Falls • See resident elephants visit Mfuwe Lodge’s reception • Go off-the-beaten-track in South Luangwa • Experience the best walking safaris in Africa • Enjoy beautiful riverside settings • Stay at intimate bush camps in unspoilt regions

subfolders.title: Kenya On A Shoestring
subfolders.description: Tick off the Big 5 • Explore the bush on foot with Masai warriors • Stay comfortably at intimate safari camps • Experience day & night drives • Take a scenic hot air balloon flight over the Masai Mara • Feel at home in a relaxed & friendly setting
